Class RedstoneSettingsHandler

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.RedstoneSettingsHandler
public class RedstoneSettingsHandler extends NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
A NBT handler specific to all redstone settings.
Since:
0.4.13
